preconditions.precondition: Buyer has registered as an observer in the Market
Seller has put the item up for sale

successEndConditions.condition: Buyer successfully buys the item from Seller

failureEndConditions.condition: Buyer does not have enough money to buy the item

mainSequence.step: Buyer registers as an observer in the Market
Seller puts the item up for sale
Market notifies Buyer of new items
Buyer buys the item from Seller
Seller removes the item from the Market
Seller transfers the item to Buyer
